boat.construction_details: Douglas Fir strip plank with diagonal veneer, laminated beams, Iroko coamings, Solid Douglas fir spars

for_sales.sales_text:
This beautiful little boat has a big boat feel and has been loved. She is now for sale due to business commitments and a lack of time, the owner is a IMarEST Marine Surveyor and has ensured the boat is kept in top condition.

2018 improvements include:
New keel cable
Expoxy pained keel and antifoul
Tohatsu 6hp saildrive ( new) only 2 hours !
Fishfinder and depth sounder
Electronic chart
Decks painted and varnish work completed.
New electronic and manual bilge pump installed
New standing rigging backstays, made by Juimmy Green Chandlers

The boat is at Eastbourne and has a reduced fee mooring, this can be transferred at point of sale, this saves a few hundred pounds a year. The transfer of the mooring is the under the control of Premier Marinas and the new onwer.

The owner of this boat is over 6ft and the boat has two very usable berths, having slept on the boat regulary.

Poppy is a lovely little affordable sailing yacht. Priced for a quick no quibble sale.

Poppy is for sale. The current owner considers that she would be a good buy at £5500. She has not been sailed this season and requires painting and varnishing and the canvas needs cleaning. She is in good condition less cosmetic issues as above. No structural issues known.

Works in last 24 months:

  • New backstay cables.
  • New drop keel cable
  • New Hand Bilge Pump
  • New outboard bracket
  • Tohatsu Saildrive Outdrive, 6hp new 2018
  • As original no alteration ( nb this is not a converted inboard engine design, has always been an outboard )
  • All sails ( red ) available.
  • Beach legs.
  • All lines, anchor.
  • Tailor's stove.
  • Leisure life raft and electric flare / 2stroke 8HP Tohatsu available under separate negotiation.
  • Repainted internal/external, underside treated with 2 stage paint.
  • Solar panel with 12 V battery.
Moored at Sovereign Harbour Eastbourne on reduced price restricted pontoon ( £200 saving ), currently afloat. Removal from water fees to be paid by purchaser if required.

boat.full_description: Poppy was originally a bespoke build for a 70-year old gentleman, a North West coastal enthusiast. The mast is fitted in a tabernacle. She has 2 berths with a Taylors paraffin stove. Changing hands in 2017, she sails the Solent and Isle of Wight coast.
boat.name: Poppy
boat.short_description: Poppy, previously known as Womble, is a John Leather design built by David Moss in 1985..
